column2: janis m. (nee roedig) loving and generous wife of william a. findlow for 54 years
column3: kind and compassionate mother of michael w. (deborah celestin) and david s. (jenifer sissel) findlow
column16: 2015. age 74 years. residence anderson twp. mass of christian burial at guardian angels church mt. washington on thur. june 18
column17: at 10:30 am. friends may visit at the church on thur. from 9:30-10:30 am. memorials to national kidney foundation. interment gate of heaven cemetery. t p white & sons funeral home serving the family.
